doc.field: Counties and Minor Civil Divisions (Cities and Townships), 1990
Counties and Minor Civil Divisions (Cities and Townships), 1990

This is a polygon layer of county and minor civil divisions (cities and townships) in the 7-county Twin Cities metropolitan area as of 1990.
NOTES: - Lines are of limited positional accuracy - COMCDLUT (or comcdlut.dbf) is an available table with additional county/mcd attributes. However, it is geared toward more recent data. - Some MCDs are split between two counties. Only those parts of MCDs within the 7-county area are included.

No tests have been conducted for attribute accuracy.</attraccr> </attracc> <logic>The dataset is topologically 'clean'.</logic> <complete>Entire seven county geographic area is covered.</complete> <posacc> <horizpa> <horizpar>The positional accuracy of the dataset has not been tested under the National Standards for Spatial Data Accuracy. The estimated positional accuracy is UNKNOWN.</horizpar> </horizpa> <vertacc> <vertaccr /> </vertacc> </posacc> <lineage> <srcinfo> <srcscale /> </srcinfo> <procstep> <procdesc>This dataset was compiled from 1990 post-census TIGER line files, the Metropolitan Council's Geographic Base File (GBF) DIME dataset as well as 1990 MN/DOT roads data. No documentation exists describing how the boundaries were derived from these datasets.</procdesc> </procstep> </lineage> </dataqual> <spdoinfo> <indspref>The county/MCD lookup table is referenced by city name, FIPS place codes (5 digit), FIPS county codes (state standard = 3 digits), in addition to a number of other codes.</indspref> <direct>Vector</direct> <mgmg3obj>arcs, nodes, polygons, label points</mgmg3obj> <mgmg3til>One layer for entire seven county region.</mgmg3til> </spdoinfo> <spref> <horizsys> <geograph> <latres /> <longres /> <geogunit /></geograph> <planar> <mapproj> <mapprojn /> <mgmg4par /> <otherprj /> </mapproj> <gridsys> <gridsysn>UTM</gridsysn> <utm> <utmzone>15</utmzone> </utm> <spcs> <spcszone /> </spcs> <mgmg4coz /> <mgmg4adj /> </gridsys> <planci> <coordrep> <absres /> <ordres /> </coordrep> <distbrep> <distres /> </distbrep> <plandu>Meters</plandu> </planci> </planar> <geodetic> <horizdn>NAD83</horizdn> <ellips>GRS80</ellips> </geodetic> </horizsys> <vertdef> <altsys> <altdatum /> <altunits /> </altsys> <depthsys> <depthdn /> <depthdu /> </depthsys> </vertdef> </spref> <eainfo> <overview> <eaover>Polygon Attributes:
CO: 3 digit FIPS and state standard county code; e.g. 163, 003
MCD: 5 digit FIPS place code for the minor civil division
MCD_NAME: MCD name; e.g. Burns Twp, Blaine
MCD_ABBREV: MCD 6 character abbreviation; e.g. ANDOVE, ANOKAX
COMCD_DESCRIP: MCD description; e.g. Burns Township, Blaine (Anoka Co. part)
COMCD: 8 digit code redefined from CO and MCD
COMCD_OLD: Old Metropolitan Council 6 digit county-MCD code
MCD_TYPE: MCD type. C = city, T = Twp, U = unorg.
ABC_SORT: 3 digit integer that will sort alphabetically e.g. St. is sorted as Saint
FIVE_COLOR: Numbers 1 to 5 for shading MCDs so adjacent MCDs have different colors
COMCD_POP_1990: 1990 population for county-MCDs based on the 1990 census (including subsequent corrections of the data by the Census Bureau)</eaover> <eadetcit>None</eadetcit> </overview> </eainfo> <distinfo> <distrib> <cntinfo> <cntperp> <cntper>Mark Kotz</cntper> <cntorg>Metropolitan Council</cntorg> </cntperp> <cntpos>GIS Database Administrator</cntpos> <cntaddr> <addrtype> mailing and physical address </addrtype> <address>Mears Park Centre, 390 Robert Street North</address> <city>St. Paul</city> <state>Minnesota</state> <postal>55101-1805</postal> </cntaddr> <cntvoice>651-602-1644</cntvoice> <cntfax>651-602-1674</cntfax> <cntemail>mark.kotz@metc.state.mn.us</cntemail> </cntinfo> </distrib> <resdesc>Census1990MnDOTCountyMCD</resdesc> <distliab>NOTICE: The Geographic Information System (GIS) Data to which this notice is attached are made available pursuant to the Minnesota Government Data Practices Act (Minnesota Statutes Chapter 13).
